name: Supreme Cannon
effect: [Main] Return all of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less to their owners' hands. If you have a Digimon in play with [Garurumon] or [Omnimon] in its name, return all of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less to their owners' hands instead. Trash all of the digivolution cards of those Digimon.
